WorkItem.Description:
Character file is attached.  On my shadow priest, Rawr.ShadowPriest values everything as having equal burst dps and sustained dps.  This is clearly not possible and hints at an issue somewhere.  I'm still learning the Rawr source so am yet unable to track it down.
Of note:  if I begin removing one piece of gear at a time by changing slots to "Empty", the burst=sustained eventually stops being equal.  Usually happens about the 4th or 5th item.  You can mark slots empty in any order to see the effect.
Tested with 2.19, 2.20, 2.23, 2.24, all produce the same burst==sustained issue.
WorkItem.Summary: [ShadowPriest] Burst==Sustained for all items, all stats, all gems, all enchants

Comments.Message: This isn't a bug, that's how it's intended to work. Burst and Sustained will have equal values when you have enough mana to maintain your highest DPS rotation for the whole fight.
